creator: bonhamcm@thirdeyeconsulting.com
text:
I've added two new ClearCase tasks: CCMkLabel and CCMkLblType.  Here's a usage 
example:

    <ccmklbtype viewpath="${cc.view.dir}"
                replace="true"
                label="BUILD_10_02_02"
    />
    <ccmklabel viewpath="${cc.view.dir}"
               recurse="true"
               replace="true"
               label="BUILD_10_02_02"
    />

The replace attribute determines whether to try and replace the label/label 
type that already exists.

I've attached the new files as well as the diffs to defaults.properties and 
ClearCase.java.

Hopefully somebody else could use these tasks!

Thanks.

--
Chris Bonham
President/CEO
Third Eye Consulting, Inc.
